subject: Bull Riding
Rodeos
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: A Honduran man who pleaded guilty to selling heroin was sentenced to 20 years in prison for supplying the drugs that killed a young professional bull rider and two other people last year.
snippet: A Honduran man who pleaded guilty to selling heroin was sentenced to 20 years in prison for supplying the drugs that killed a young professional bull rider and two other people last year.
